title: Aliexpress GTX 1050 Ti vs Wish.com GTX 1050 Ti. Real vs Fake
description: #wish.com #aliexpress #gtx1050ti I decided to compare the shopping experience of buying a graphics card from Aliexpress to Wish.com, just too see which is worse. The two infamous online retailers I bought an Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti from both websites.
